children.title: Piercing Shot
children.description: Shots go through more than one enemy

children.title: Charged Shot
children.description: Hold down to power up a shot & then shoot it to do more damage

children.title: Multishot
children.description: Fires 3 arrows in a cone in front of the player

children.title: Dash
children.description: Press Space Bar to Dash forward, leaving a trail of elements behind you

children.title: Basic Bow
children.description: Just fires one shot in the direction you're facing

children.text: This is if we had respawning enemies.
This is if we had respawning enemies.
